dcterms:creator: K. Simonyan
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten digits, commonly used for training various image processing systems. It consists of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images of 28x28 pixel grayscale images of digits from 0 to 9.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: K. Simonyan
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset is utilized in the context of Principal Component Analysis (PCA) and Locally Linear Embedding (LLE) to demonstrate the effectiveness of these dimensionality reduction techniques.
dcterms:title: MNIST (used in the context of PCA and LLE)
